rule.name: MissingPluralVariableName
rule.message: The variable {0} is not named in plural although its type {1} represents a collection.
rule.description: A variable that represents a collection (incl. set and list) should be named in plural form.

rule.name: MissingUnitSuffix
rule.message: The variable {0} does not encode the unit in its name although it represents a physical variable.
rule.description: A variable that represents a physical variable should also encode the unit in its name.

rule.name: NoEmptyLineAfterMethodHeader
rule.message: The body of the method declaration {0} starts with an empty line although it must directly begin with its first statement.
rule.description: The body of a method declaration must start with a statement, not an empty line.

rule.name: TypeJavadocShouldStartWith
rule.message: The Javadoc of the type {0} does not start with {1}, but with {2}.
rule.description: The Javadoc of a type should always start with the given characters.
rule.example:
<properties>
		<property name="firstCharacters" value="Represents " />
	</properties>
	
	/** Represents a complex number. */
	class ComplexNumber { ... }

rule.name: NonHeaderCommentSize
rule.description: Determines whether the dimensions of non-header comments found are within the specified limits.
